p: (3) Method 3. Take purified (Shuddha) gouripashana in a mud pot. Put 15 g of Goat's milk and cover by a cloth. Place this in a pit and cover it by using mud by the width of middle phalanges of middle finger. Then, ignite using dried cow-dung as the fuel. This procedure is repeated 21 times. For each burning, add 56 ml goat's milk and finally get purified yellow red gouripasana [ 52, 53].
